name: NULLIF
shortDescription: Return NULL if values are equal
description: Returns NULL if the two expressions are equal, otherwise returns the first expression.

parameters.name: expression1
parameters.description: Value to return (if not equal to expression2)

examples.title: Avoid division by zero
examples.sql: SELECT total / NULLIF(count, 0) as average FROM stats

examples.title: Treat empty as NULL
examples.sql: SELECT NULLIF(email, '') as email FROM users

examples.title: Treat sentinel values as NULL
examples.sql: SELECT NULLIF(status_code, -1) as status FROM records

notes: Useful for preventing division by zero
Useful for treating special values as NULL
